text: Ronald Bullough (born 1931) is a British materials scientist. He has made leading contributions in the field of irradiated solids. He is a former Chief Scientist and Director of Corporate Research at the UK Atomic Energy Authority. == References == Category:British materials scientists Category:British nuclear physicists Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the Institute of Physics Category:Members of the United States National Academy of Engineering Category:National Physical Laboratory (United Kingdom) Category:Fellows of the Royal Society
title: Ronald Bullough
